name: Music_3076.wav
keywords: ['pop ballad', 'piano song', 'simple percussion', 'male voice', 'romantic theme', 'vocal harmony', 'vocal octaves', 'muted guitar', 'bass', 'synth fill']
caption: This pop ballad features two male voices singing in octaves. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A bass plays the root notes of the chords. A piano plays the chords by striking them just once per bar. When the voice pauses between verses, another voice sings descending pattern vocables in falsetto. When the main voice resumes, a synth fill is played along with a muted guitar. The rest of the instruments continue to play their respective parts. This song has a romantic mood. This song can be played in a romantic movie.
